skillTree.localised_description: The ground crystals of Tzeentch's realm can imbue darts with the power to pierce any ward and find the weakest points on the most formidable foes.
Harvested from a rare flower found only in the most toxic corners of Nurgle's gardens, this poison ensures a long and painful death.
Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Oxyotl’s time was closer to an age of technological wonders, when the Lizardmen wielded the Old Ones’ untold devices of mysterious power.
With nothing but instincts and cunning, Oxyotl survived the creatures of the Chaos Realm. In this realm, they will not survive him.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Immune to Psychology when fighting Daemons of Chaos, Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Beastmen and Norsca
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Time after time, Oxyotl’s enemies arrive to find him ensconced nearby, soon meeting their deaths in a hail of barbed darts.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

Attribute: Unspottable for Chamelon Stalker units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

effects.description:
Attribute: Snipe for Chamelon Skinks
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit remains hidden while firing.

effects.description:
Attribute: Stalk for all Skink Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: The path back from the Chaos Realm passes through fell places that cannot be recounted, but also forgotten lands of wondrous creatures.

effects.description:
Unlocks Hero recruitment: Skink Oracle
	(all provinces)

Missile resistance: 15% for Troglodon, Coatl and Skink Oracle units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Troglodon, Coatl, and Skink Oracle units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Extinction is the rule. Survival is the exception.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Missile Damage +8% when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A first-hand glimpse of the world’s fate – should Chaos succeed – is enough to know the fight against them must never falter.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +50% for all Skink Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -50% for all Skink and Chameleon Skink Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

Melee attack: +4 for Saurus units

skillTree.localised_description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

skillTree.localised_description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

skillTree.localised_description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Saurus and Temple Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection – a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

skillTree.localised_description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

Armour: +10 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.
This unit remains hidden while firing.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

factionEffects.localised_description: The long-lost hunter’s reappearance accompanied portents of Daemons returning and war eternal, but also a spontaneous and unheralded spawning of his kind.

effects.description: Skink RoRs gain +9 Melee Attack, Melee Defence, Leadership, and %+n% Missile Damage (to account for their ranks being 'fake')
Silent Sanctums: Unlock long-lost Sanctums in any visible region to grant Oxyotl local bonuses and secret visibility

Upkeep: -15% for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
	(all armies)
Magic item drop chance from battle: +5%
Additional +1 Melee Attack, Melee Defence and Leadership per experience rank for all Skink Infantry units
Additional +1% Speed and Missile Damage per experience rank for all Skink Infantry units
Melee defence: +3 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Weapon strength: +3% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units

items.colour_text: With just the lightest exhalation, this golden instrument of death blasts forth a hail of murderous darts.
The ground crystals of Tzeentch's realm can imbue darts with the power to pierce any ward and find the weakest points on the most formidable foes.

effects.description:
"Daemonbane" ammunition
	(assigned Skink blowpipe or javelin unit)

items.colour_text: Imbued with a Bloodthirster's crushed horn, the already-explosive blood of a Fireleech gains horrifying sentience, clinging to armour until it burns the flesh beneath.

effects.description:
"Fireblood Toxin" ammunition
	(assigned Skink blowpipe or javelin unit)

items.colour_text: Harvested from a rare flower found only in the most toxic corners of Nurgle's gardens, this poison ensures a long and painful death.

effects.description: Attacks cause "Slow Death" effect, draining hitpoints

"Slow Death" ammunition
	(assigned Skink blowpipe or javelin unit)

items.colour_text: Slaaneshi daemons are masters of illusion – a combination of their blood with the toxins of rare toads produces a debilitating hallucinogen.

effects.description:
"Toadskin Essence" ammunition
	(assigned Skink blowpipe or javelin unit)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Already an accomplished hunter when Chaos came to the world, Oxyotl mounted countless bold ambushes with his spawn-kin against the oncoming hordes.

effects.description:
Immune to diplomatic penalties from trespassing
	(Lord's army)

Has access to Masterful Ambush stance, requiring less movement range to adopt and with a reduced detection chance
	(Lord's army)

Armour-piercing missile damage: +40% for all Skink Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Experience gain for units: +100% when fighting against the Forces of Chaos
	(Lord's army)
